title: Telemetry via influx
description:
Enables the extended logging capabilities.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/influxdb-native/

address.title: Address
address.description:
The complete url of the influxdb including the port if different from defaults in http/https.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/influxdb-native/

buffer_size.title: Points in buffer
buffer_size.description:
Use 0 to send events immediately or set the number of points that should be sent together.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/influxdb-native/

db.title: DB name
db.description:
Name of the database, defaults to krakend.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/influxdb-native/

username.title: Username
username.description:
Username to authenticate to InfluxDB.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/influxdb-native/

password.title: Password
password.description:
Password to authenticate to InfluxDB.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/telemetry/influxdb-native/
